settings_schema.header: To report an issue, make a suggestion or a contribution, or fork your own version of the plugin, [check the repository](https://github.com/waseem18/mattermost-plugin-jenkins).

settings.help_text: The URL for your Jenkins instance. Must start with http:// or https://. For example: https://jenkins.example.com.
Select the username of the user that the plugin will post with. This can be any user, the name and icon will be overridden when posting.
The AES encryption key used to encrypt stored access tokens.
